name: Constance Belle Mare Plage

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'll be putting a proper review together in the next week or so - I wanted to get the pictures up quickly.
reviews.title: DON'T BOOK this hotel - You will be dissapointed, bad service and food.....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: BMP not a 5 star hotel by ANY stretch of the imagination.
reviews.title: Heavenly!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service: Shocking..
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff: Rude, iggnorant, insolent, useless...... barr a few diamonds in the rough
reviews.title: Special

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled solo
reviews.text: Room: Excellent, if you get the Prestige Suite with Sea View (it'll be about 160GBP sterling a night - DO NOT PAY MORE)
reviews.title: nice stay, but rooms disappointing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Belle Mare Hotel for 7 nights in august! We were very lucky as we had nice weather almost all days we were there! the ones we had some clouds we took a car we rent with Gerard Monet with a very good value (25€ per day everything included) and we visited some nice spots in the island.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The Hotel is located at the east side and i read in many reviews that it was a very windy side, the truth is that we had a strong wind just one day and at noon it was completly over! For us it wasn't a problem at all plus after visit the west coast if one day i come back definetly i would like to go to the east, less touristic, more wild, and real mauritius! The north-west coast is really prepared for tourists, shops, restaurants, everything expensive...
reviews.title: Beautiful resort.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Constance Belle Mare is a very beautiful Hotel, once we entered at the lobby we realized the hotel was a good choice! We got married in march so the honeymoon package was available for us (it's valid after 9months after the wedding) so well, we were upgraded from a Prestige room we had booked to a Deluxe Suite of 95 square meters. The Suite was huge with a big balcony facing the beach, so you can imagine how relaxing it was to fall asleep with the sound of the waves...just amazing! The furniture probably is a bit old and a refurbishment would be great! I heard the Junior Suites are completely refurnished. We were so happy with that room and we can't complain at all.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, superb room and outstanding value for money!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The first night we got a white wine bottle in the room and the bath was full of foam and flowers...very nice!
reviews.title: Hi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The food is very goodm for breakfast you have lots of choices...so you never get bored. For dinner there is a mediterranean part with pasta and pizza, an asian part that every night is changing (one day thai, another japanese...), then a Mauritian part, saladas part, grilled side...and a delicious side of desserts...
reviews.title: Absolutely fabulous!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spend the last week of our honeymoon here. Read all the reviews so was pretty clued up. We had a quite active run up so just wanted to chill out which is exactly what we did in a perfect location. It was winter but weather perfect.
reviews.title: Perfect End to Honeymoon!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beach perfect, loads of sports included if you wish to partake. As we were half board we ate in the buffet 5 out of 7 nights and is the best buffet I have ever had although it was nice to be served for the other 2 nights. Some of the other restaurants also do half board menus.
reviews.title: amazing food and great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The only bad point is the prices of things not included ie lunch and drinks which are astronomical, cheapest bottle of wine about £20. However we knew this so stocked up from duty free in South Africa. However if you do buy wine you can keep till the next night if you don't finish the bottle. Take plenty of fruit etc from breakfast so you don't have to buy lunch!
reviews.title: Lovely place - but dont go in their winter

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The price of drinks has a detrimental effect on the nightlife as the drinks are so expensive no one sits in the bar so it is dead but this didn't bother us.
reviews.title: great place, great service, great island

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff all pleasant and superb.
reviews.title: A great location and excellent service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: If you are looking for both privacy and the comfort of an hotel; this is THE solution.
reviews.title: splendid stay in the Belle mare plage Villa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed for 16 days in one of the Villas and had a fantastic stay in the Belle Mare resort.
reviews.title: So Delicious - So Mauritius.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff was very competent and friendly and evrything was in a splendid condition and well taken care off. With young children the banquet offers many choises. The food was good in every restaurant. If you are fond of chocolat be sure to be in the Citronelle on a saturday!!
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel, fantastic room.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Just returned from a fantastic two weeks and wanted to post a review as I found other reviews so helpful.
reviews.title: Personalised service...loved this place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Whilst we were there a couple of people moaned about the weather. Only one day did it rain throughout the day but it certainly didn't pevent us from doing what we had planned. If you visit the southern hemisphere in the winter then you can't expect the same weather as in the summer. The UK in January is hardly beach weather!
reviews.title: PARADISE

aka: Constance Belle Mare Plage Hotel Belle Mare
description: Stroll down the endless white sand beach, play golf on 2 championship golf courses, explore the stunning Indian Ocean, pamper yourself at our Spa. Whatever you and your family dream of at the unique Constance Belle Mare Plage we’ve got it covered.You can enjoy the choices from 7 restaurants offering everything from elegant fine dining experiences to burgers and salads on the beach. Seize the opportunity to try new things whether it’s diving for the first time, water skiing, kite surfing or just picking up some gastronomic tips from our world-class chefs in one of our cookery classes. Relax and unwind at our Spa de Constance and Shiseido Spa where we’ll pamper you with the latest treatments and massages. Let the kids have their own adventure making new friends at Kakoo, the free all-day children's club.Belle Mare Plage is part of our Unique Resorts Collection.
